amendment.purpose: An amendment to clarify the form and debate time of certain amendments to the bill H.R. 2601.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bishop (UT) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: On ordering the previous question on the amendment (A001) and on the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 226 - 196 (Roll no. 383).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Bishop (UT).

Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Bishop (UT) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
